import React, {useState} from 'react'; import {Button, Modal} from 'react-bootstrap'; import {List, ListItem, ListItemAvatar,Avatar,ListItemText} from '@material-ui/core' export default function QuestInfoBtn() { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const quest_info = { title: 'The Great Novigrad Heist', description: 'Free the witches', nodes: [ { title: 'start', description: 'start it', date: Date(Date.now()).toString(), isComplete: true }, { title: 'middle', description: 'middle part', date: Date(Date.now()).toString(), isComplete: true }, { title: 'end', description: 'The last part', date: Date(Date.now()).toString(), isComplete: false } ], mentor: "John", date_finish: Date(Date.now()).toString() }; return ( <> {quest_info.title}

{quest_info.title}

{quest_info.description}

{ quest_info.nodes.map((node, index)=>(

{node.description}

)) }

{quest_info.mentor}

{quest_info.date_finish}

 ); }
